item.title: Interview of M4tou - 41 years old - Marine navigation specialist in reconversion
item.author: Root-Me
item.description: Specialist in maritime navigation, M4tou started a reorientation in 2017 in order to work in computer security. It was during his training in computer architecture design, cyber path, that he discovered Root-Me
